roleset.name: sort into groups categorically

example.name: assort-v
example.text: Recombination and genetic linkage The diploid nature of chromosomes allows for genes on different chromosomes to assort independently or be separated from their homologous pair during sexual reproduction wherein haploid gametes are formed .

example.name: assort-v: arg3
example.text: Characteristic leather bowling shoes assorted by size in wooden shelves in a bowling alley.

example.name: assorted-j
example.text: The contraband and stolen property was piled in assorted heaps on the back veranda of the bungalow.

example.name: assorted-j
example.text: In the earlier eighteenth century this rather ill-assorted selection of authors comprised the Greek reading of the ordinary educated man.

roleset.note: ASSORT-V, ASSORTING-N, ASSORTED-J NOTES: Added by Julia for Clearearth-biotexts

roleset.name: consisting of a variety of types

role.descr: things of which many varieties are represented

example.name: assortment-n
example.text: The engineers stared at the ragtag assortment of parts and then immediately got to work and came up with a unique design using plastic bags, cardboard, and duct tape to save the astronauts.

example.name: assorted-j
example.text: She was wearing assorted shades of red beautifully woven and cro- cheted into a wicked patterned poncho.
example.arg: shades of red beautifully woven and cro- cheted into a wicked patterned poncho.

roleset.note: ASSORT-V, ASSORTING-N, ASSORTED-J NOTES: Added by Julia for Clearearth-biotexts
